DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess conception , pregnancy , childbirth , pain experience among woman diagnose vulvodynia . Specifically , study aim examine follow among woman diagnose vulvodynia : 1 ) rate pregnancy/childbirth desire child ; 2 ) fear pregnancy childbirth ; 3 ) potential difficulty experience attempt become pregnant pregnancy/childbirth ; 4 ) method use become pregnant deliver ; 5 ) method use manage vulvodynia symptom pregnancy ; 6 ) pain outcomes associated pregnancy . Very little research examine pregnancy/childbirth experience among woman vulvodynia , natural history vulvodynia . As preliminary investigation provide descriptive information regard many propose research question . Based clinical experience investigator , expect woman vulvodynia report low rate pregnancy high level fear pregnancy childbirth comparison woman without pain . It also expect woman vulvodynia report difficulty become pregnant compare woman without pain , woman vulvodynia report elective nonvaginal birth comparison vaginal birth .
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy , Childbirth Intentions Outcomes Under Sexual Pain
DOC.criteria: previous diagnosis vulvodynia physician ( woman vulvodynia ) assess and/or treat one 3 clinic ( woman vulvodynia ) free chronic vulvar pain pain sexual intercourse lifetime ( control woman ) 19 year age older fluent English young 19 year age lack fluency English
